table.caption: Table 143 – Variables used in the page group compositing formulas
head: Variable
Meaning
rows: The page group, consisting of all elements E 1 , … , E n in the page’s top-level stack
Computed colour of the page group
Computed shape of the page group
Computed alpha of the page group
Initial colour of the page (nominally white but may vary depending on the properties of the medium or the needs of the application)
An undefined colour (which is not used, since the α 0 argument of Composite is 0)
